definition: to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
to talk endlessly on the phone

sentences.english: Not long ago she took Heather to a shrimp boil.
Women love to talk on the phone.
He just likes to talk on the phone, you’ll get through sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 他就是喜歡“煲電話粥”，你遲早會打通的。

sentences.english: The flavor of chicken soup on the slow fire with deliciousness and the milky taste.
sentences.chinese: 老火煲雞風味，突出了雞湯的鮮甜感和脂肪香氣。

sentences.english: What if today I phoned a friend just to chat?
sentences.chinese: 如果我今天和朋友煲電話粥，那會怎樣？

sentences.english: Soup Making Lesson FOC, June Series.
sentences.chinese: 沈希六月免費教你煲靚湯。

sentences.english: Bring 2 bowls of water to boil, add mushrooms and broccoli. Simmer for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 煲滾兩碗水，放入冬菇及西蘭花煮5分鐘。

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn't hog the phone.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要煲電話粥。

sentences.english: He spends hours on the telephone, taking to his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他和他朋友煲電話粥好幾小時了。

sentences.english: I especially like to cook carrot and pig bone soup.
sentences.chinese: 我最愛煲青紅蘿蔔豬骨湯。

sentences.english: Men love to talk on the phone.
But not boiling pot of Chinese herbal medicines and some of the soup.
sentences.chinese: 但不宜煲煮一些加了中藥材的的湯品。

sentences.english: If you would like to continue breast-feeding mothers can eat pig octopus pot.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還想繼續餵奶，母親可以喫八爪魚煲豬腳。

sentences.english: When Floater sinks down, open lid. Add fi sh balls and press any button to boil.
sentences.chinese: 待粥煮成，確定浮子已下沉，打開煲蓋，再按任何。

sentences.english: There are vegetarian, meat and seafood casseroles. All different choices are available to meet your appetite.
sentences.chinese: 有純素菜煲，亦有肉類及海鮮煲，任君選擇。
